thread.title: Luxury cruise trip to Egypt

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Luxury cruise trip to Egypt
text:
Luxury cruise trip to Egypt Published on : Wednesday, July 8, 2015
Cruise holiday specialists ecruising.travel have added a new cruise tour to its collection, with a special luxury 16-night exclusive itinerary which includes a Nile cruise on board Sanctuary Cruises stunning Sun Boat IV.
Departing Australia on November 7, this luxurious experience begins with three nights in Dubai at the Raffles Hotel before flying to Cairo. Based at the high end Fairmont Nile City Hotel, spend three days visiting the city’s main highlights including the Pyramids and Sphinx and the renowned Egyptian Museum.
Fly to Luxor for three nights pre-cruise at the Sofitel Winter Palace before boarding Sun Boat IV for a four-night cruise along the Nile to Aswan. Daily comprehensive sightseeing includes Temple of Karnak, Valleys of the Kings and Queens, Hatshepsut Temple, Luxor temple, Edfu and Temple of Horus, a motorbike ride to Philae Temple and the Unfinished Obelisk, a traditional Felucca ride around Elephantine Island and much more.
Disembark at Aswan and relax for three nights at the Sofitel Legend Old Cataract hotel before transferring for your return flight to Australia. The Cataract provided the setting for mystery writer Agatha Christie’s thriller “Death on the Nile”.
This exclusive package is priced from $8,169 per person twin share from Sydney, Melbourne and Brisbane. It also includes return economy airfares, escorted private touring, internal airfares in Egypt, private transfers and full board meal plan on board Sun Boat IV.
